judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandarino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Benjamin H. Levintow and David Bichman, Assistant District Attorneys, BAoha/rd A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. McFarland, Appellant.
Submitted January 8, 1974.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandarino, JJ.
Bichard A. DeMichele, for appellant.
Benjamin H. Levintow and David Bichman, Assistant District Attorneys, BAoha/rd A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
October 16, 1974:
